build.function: Build file templates revised with correct path to eclipselink.jar and others

IAM 12c PatchSet 4 extended
IAM 12c PatchSet 4 adopted
Identity Manager Connection
ContentSet for build and test are included in the initial project setup.
DocBook Site Author Provider added.
Removed ANT wsm-pmlib.jar and wsm-agent-core.jar from classpath and extended by adding javax.management.j2ee.jarclasspath due to the changes in the deployment framework.
Extended ANT classpath by adding eclipselink.jar which is needed by the OIM Admin Role operations.
Extended ANT classpath by adding configmgmt.jar which is needed comfigure OAM service.
Extended ANT classpath by adding orai18n-mapping.jar which is needed by the sandbox operations.
Migrated to Oracle JDeveloper 12c (Release 12.2.1.3)
Add libraries to control registrations of various components.

Property static.dir defined to handle web content during assembly.
Included file extensions ini,xsl,ejx,xcfg,cpx,dcx,sva,tld and tag in the pattern of files copied to output directory if ANT compiles the project.
Removed javax.servlet_1.0.0.0_2-5.jar and javax.jsp_1.2.0.0_2-1.jar from oracle.fmw.wsri hence oracle.fmw.jee and oracle.fmw.wsri needs to be specified in the build classpath.
Path "oracle.fmw.mds" extended with commons-cli-1.0.jar.
Path "oracle.fmw.adf" renamed to oracle.fmw.adf.view.
New path "oracle.fmw.jsp" to include glassfish.el_1.0.0.0_2-1.jar in build classpath if required.
New path "oracle.fmw.jmx" to include javax.management_1.2.1.jar,javax.management.j2ee_1.0.jar,jmxframework.jar,jmxspi.jar,xmlef.jar,dms.jar in build classpath if required.
New path "oracle.fmw.adf.model" to include ADF model libraries in build classpath if required.
New path "oracle.fmw.adf.runtime" to include ADF runtime libraries in build classpath if required.
New path "oracle.fmw.adf.controller" to include ADF controller libraries in build classpath if required.
New path "oracle.fmw.adf.pageflow" to include ADF page flow libraries in build classpath if required.
New path "oracle.fmw.adf.faces" to include ADF faces libraries in build classpath if required.
